description.narrative: 3.3 Children without parental care have access to institutions and programmes that facilitate their personal development and family or community insertion., which contributes to Access To Justice, Access To Justice (Covid), Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, children and adolescents, especially the most disadvantaged, benefit from a violence-free environment, a child protection system that guarantees a quality and appropriate response, and a juvenile justice system in compliance with international standards.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 3.3 Children without parental care have access to institutions and programmes that facilitate their personal development and family or community insertion.

description.narrative: UNICEF promoted the expansion of the “Support Program for Care Leavers in their transition to autonomous life (PAE)” at national level and provided assistance, by helping accelerate its implementation in 6 provinces. Likewise, it strengthened the participation of adolescents without parental care to enable them to have an impact on the newly elected government's agenda. UNICEF supported the implementation of a local Guide on residential alternative care standards, contributing to the design of a state program for the monitoring of Residences based on the alternative care guidelines. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of initiatives (studies, assessments, evaluations, work documents) that support the existence of Family Reunification and other alternative programs to institutionalization in homes (host/foster families) in the provinces under the program.
Number of adolescents without parental care participating in Autonomy Support Programs and Policies.
Percentage of insitutions under the program that define and apply standards of quality regarding care and pedagogy, that are monitored by the State authority in the province of Entre Rios.
Status of alternative care policies and programmes adapted to respond to the COVID-19 Pandemic [COVID]
